Source: hikeChatCard.js

/**
 * Created by anurag on 20/12/16.
 */

import {NativeModules} from 'react-native';

const HikeChatCardModule = NativeModules.HikeChatCardModule;

/**
 * Hike HikeChatCard Module
 */
class HikeChatCard{
  
  /**
   * Get value from cache for cards.
   * @param {string} msgHash msgHash of the card
   * @param {string} key Key against which value is to be looked up
   *
   * @returns {Promise.String} Promise is resolved with corresponding value in cache.
   */
  static getFromCache(msgHash,key) { return HikeChatCardModule.getFromCache(msgHash,key); }

  /**
   * Put Value in Cache. This cache is not preserved in backup.
   * @param {string} msgHash msgHash of the card
   * @param {string} key Key against which value would be stored.
   * @param {string} value Value which needs to be stored.
   */
  static putInCache(msgHash,key, value) { HikeChatCardModule.putInCache(msgHash,key, value); }
  /**
   * Remove Key-Value in Cache.
   * @param {string} msgHash msgHash of the card
   * @param {string} key Key against which value would be stored.
   */
  static removeFromCache(msgHash,key) { HikeChatCardModule.removeFromCache(msgHash,key); }

}

export default HikeChatCard;
